channel.title: How to setup a server without port forwarding?
channel.description:
Now I have a .webs.com website and would like to let my friends test out and see what they think, so I tried to follow the steps of port forwarding the server, yet I have no clue what the password is and I don't think my dad will approve <.< ..
So I'm asking is there a way without port forwarding the server and have a website do all for me? If so can someone direct to a tut or just give me the site that can do for me...I'm not afraid of paying a little money for the service if the website requires it.
